mapper.select: select phone,name from electricity_bill join user on electricity_bill.user_id = user.id where status = #{code}

select name, eb.time,eb.price,eb.summation,eb.cost,eb.status, em.previous_reading,em.reading, b.building_num,b.floor,b.doorplate from electricity_bill eb join user on eb.user_id = user.id join building b on b.id = eb.building_id join electricity_meter em on eb.electricity_meter_id = em.id where eb.time BETWEEN #{startOfMonth} AND #{endOfMonth}
